title: What do you like to do when you are not playing League? 10 Questions. I want to know YOU!
body:
I want to know who you are and some thing that you enjoy doing. I will also share things about myself, feel free to ask me other things as I might do the same to you ;) with all the love 
Signed
--Superfoxman
I have also added the question in a .txt format to make it easy.


**1. How old are you (if you are comfortable)?** 
--  22 living the LA life.

**2. What Music do you like to listen to? Care to share a link or a few? I LOVE music. ** 
--  EDM/Dubstep/Trap  If it makes me want to dance, I will! If you share music chances are I will listen to all of them.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cxliw92yHzs 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r1dquH_KOQc
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1aHoNTSsLZo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UwsY_foobEw
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SYM-RJwSGQ8
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zgdRxARv080
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KfHCHgWusHM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IyLH08BLhGU
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hrsaB0Uune8

**3. What other games do you like to play? Would you invite me?**  
--  Smash Bros, Guild Wars2, Monster Hunter, Magic the Gathering and can never go wrong with some classic runescape

**4. When you go to the outernet (outside) what do you enjoy doing?  **
--  Recently been getting out more often and preforming magic tricks close to the beach for cute girls ;) 

**5. Reddit, 9gag or 4chan? Favorite sub/board?**  
--  Reddit /r/videos  I watch a lot of videos and constantly save them to my youtube, I have over 800 favorites. One thing that upsets me is when a youtube video off my favorites gets removed and I don't know what it was ; __ ;

**6. What talents do you have? **
 --  I can do magic tricks and it's something I have enjoyed doing ever since I was little. I can also do weird things with my tongue. 

**7. What is one of your favorite youtube videos or Gif? **
 --  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TtzUhU9p42g

**8. What is an accomplishment you have recently made?  **
--  I wore pants over shorts for the first time this year this past couple weeks. Normally I am always wearing shorts.

**9. Where do you want to go if you had the chance?**
 --  Freeze myself until space exploration was a thing, then travel to a different galaxy to explore and hopefully not die.

**10. Who is your favorite League champion and why?**  
 --  Twisted Fate because Gambit is my favorite X-Men and he throws cards. <3
